paragraph: Color Vision Deficiency isn't the end of the world. It's just a different view of it.
author: Karen Rae Levine

paragraph: Try to be a rainbow in someone's cloud.
author: Maya Angelou

paragraph: Colors, like features, follow the changes of the emotions.
author: Pablo Picasso

paragraph: Color! What a deep and mysterious language, the language of dreams.
author: Paul Gauguin
